subject: Order #SSN5197
description_text:
Hello there,

after finally getting to assemble the pedals, I found that there's probably
one "Plus X Pedal Control Box" missing. Initially I thought this wouldn't
be included in the pedals' box as I assumed they'd come with a basic
control box without haptic reactor support. That's seemingly not the case,
but then I should have gotten two of these control boxes as I ordered one
separate item as well.

I don't really need it anyway, so could you please just refund the money
for the separate control box that I didn't receive?

Oh and let me thank you for these amazing pedals. They look, feel and
perform great. And the haptics add so much immersion.

Greetings
Dustin Koch

conversations.body_text: Hi Dustin K,     Alright, Iâ€™ve asked our operations team to arrange a refund for the controller box.
Hi Dustin K,    Okay, we've processed your refund.
